thread.section_title: GigMasters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GigMasters | www.gigmasters.com
thread.title: Customer Joe J
thread.title_full: GigMasters reviewed by Customer Joe J

author: Customer Joe J
title: Customer Joe J
text: The company that I freelance asked me to look for a talented guitarist. We hired Andrew Moffit, who played on the 70's Rock and Romance Cruise March 11-16. The only challenging things about Gigmasters website, is that it doesn't give you a way to pitch someone about coming aboard a cruise for 5 days. It only allows you to choose individual days of work. They should add a tab for longer hiring time.
